noun.description: A glucoside, C₂₂H₂₂O₈, derived from podophyllin, which is used for its antimitotic properties in preparations for the treatment of genital warts, and in the manufacture of some antineoplastic drugs.

origin: Late 19th century. From German Podophyllotoxin from podophyll- (in Podophyllin) + -o- + Toxin.
